mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoJobRequstOrdGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REQUST_SN , REQUST_ORD_GOD_TURN , GOD_NM , ORD_GOD_SECT_CD , GOD_NO , ORD_NO , ORD_GOD_TURN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_JOB_REQUST_ORD_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQUST_SN = #{requstSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND REQUST_ORD_GOD_TURN = #{requstOrdGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
